name: Simulate Generalized Lotka-Volterra Dynamics
description: Simulate microbial community dynamics using the generalized Lotka-Volterra model
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/simulate_generalized_lotka_volterra_dynamics.py

fields.name: initial_populations
fields.description: List of initial population sizes for each species

fields.name: growth_rates
fields.description: List of intrinsic growth rates for each species

fields.name: interaction_matrix
fields.description: Interaction matrix showing how species affect each other
